attributes.action: What do we want. Blumphy magic. When do we want it......NOW!
attributes.additional_details: This petition has been created to bring the man of the people out of his self imposed hiatus, and to perform more magic on that there YouTube. We don't want to watch work shy charlatans like Derren Brown and Dynamo (stupid names anyway) filmed in HD, we want glorious grainy uploads of a man with a bag on his head.
